article_title: High-Income, High Tax, and Low Savings: 3 Financial Tips to Help Break the Gen X Poverty Triangle

article_metadata.author: Mark Avallone

og.description: You are not alone. There are countless Gen X-ers in high tax brackets that directly impact their ability to save. In 2015, married joint tax filers with a combined income of $74,901 are in the 25% tax bracket; single filers enter the 25% bracket at $37,451. State income tax can [...]
